ChangeClothes.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: aiart.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ChangeClothes
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ModelUrl": "https://xxx.com/test.jpg",
    "ClothesUrl": "https://xxx.com/test.jpg",
    "ClothesType": "Upper-body",
    "RspImgType": "url"
}
ChangeClothes.title: 成功
